short_description: This function predicts unrated items and recommend topk items to users.
long_description: This function predicts unrated items and recommend topk items to users.

input_tables.name: weights
input_tables.rDescription: The table (produced by ta.knnrecommendertrain) containing the interpolation weights.
input_tables.description: The table (produced by KnnRecommenderTrain) containing the interpolation weights.

input_tables.name: bias
input_tables.rDescription: The table (produced by ta.knnrecommendertrain) containing the global, user, and item bias statistics.
input_tables.description: The table (produced by KnnRecommenderTrain) containing the global, user, and item bias statistics.

argument_clauses.name: UserIdColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: The user id column in the rating table. The default is the first column in the rating table.
argument_clauses.description: The user id column in the rating table. The default is the first column in the rating table.

argument_clauses.name: ItemIdColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: The item id column in the rating table. The default is the second column in the rating table.
argument_clauses.description: The item id column in the rating table. The default is the second column in the rating table.

argument_clauses.name: RatingColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: The rating column in the rating table. The default is the third column in the rating table.
argument_clauses.description: The rating column in the rating table. The default is the third column in the rating table.

argument_clauses.name: Topk
argument_clauses.rDescription: Number of items to recommend for each user. The topk highest-rated items are recommended.
argument_clauses.description: Number of items to recommend for each user. The TopK highest-rated items are recommended.
